title: Council Decision of 30 March 1998 appointing a member of the Advisory Committee of the Euratom Supply Agency
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 30 March 1998 appointing a member of the Advisory Committee of the Euratom Supply Agency (98/C 114/02)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Atomic Energy Community, and in particular the second and third paragraphs of Article 54 thereof,
Having regard to Article X of the Statutes of the Euratom Supply Agency (1), as last amended by Decision 95/1/EC/Euratom/ECSC of 1 January 1995 (2),
Having regard to the Council Decision of 27 June 1997 appointing the members of the Advisory Committee of the Euratom Supply Agency (3),
Having regard to the opinion of the Commission,
Whereas a member's seat on the aforementioned Committee has become vacant following the resignation of Ms Anne McGINLEY, which was brought to the Council's attention on 9 January 1998;
Whereas this vacancy should be filled;
Having regard to the nomination submitted by the Irish Government on 9 January 1998,
main_body:
Sole Article
Mr Patrick FAY is hereby appointed a member of the Advisory Committee of the Euratom Supply Agency for the remainder of the Committee's term of office, that is until 28 March 1999.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 30 March 1998.
For the Council
The President
LORD SIMON of HIGHBURY
(1) OJ 27, 6.12.1958, p. 534/58.
(2) OJ L 1, 1.1.1995, p. 1.
(3) OJ C 210, 11.7.1997, p. 3.
